Reviews.Title: Cell Phone
Reviews.Author: H. Lesser
Reviews.Content: I was quite surprised at the condition of the phone when it arrived being as it was a refurbished phone, but you could not tell it from new and it works great and i am very happy with Amazon as a company that I use quite a bit for my online purchases.

Reviews.Title: Just what I needed.
Reviews.Author: Douglas Thompson
Reviews.Content: Great little phone, perfect for what like needed. Small light, I hardly notice it in my pocket. I would recommend this product to all.

Reviews.Title: I love this phone.
Reviews.Author: R. J. Marks
Reviews.Content: perfect phone for a guy like me cause i don't use my phone for anything else but a phone, if i wanted a computer i would use my computer not my phone. so with that being said calls are clear simple to use buttons are large what more can you ask for in a phone.

Reviews.Title: Nokia phone
Reviews.Author: lamar woodruff
Reviews.Content: Just wanted it for parts and it served my purpose.  I had the same phone with a worn-out keypad surface.
